page.title: DigitalNest Role Overview
page.description: As a Web Developer at DigitalNest, I built and enhanced websites, mentored interns, and optimized workflows, focusing on accessibility, SEO, and impactful solutions.
page.html:
Overview of My Role at DigitalNest Nonprofit as a Web Developer

As a Web Developer at DigitalNest, I contributed to empowering youth through technology by creating and maintaining impactful web solutions tailored to the organization's mission. My role required a blend of technical expertise, mentorship, and collaboration to ensure the website and related projects aligned with DigitalNest's goals.

Key Achievements

  1. Collaborative Web Development:

    • Worked alongside developers, designers, and stakeholders to build and enhance the DigitalNest website.

    • Translated Figma designs into functional web pages, adhering to design guidelines for consistency and branding.

    • Improved website navigation and user interfaces to enhance the experience for DigitalNest's diverse audience.

  2. Feature Development and Optimization:

    • Designed and implemented new website features, focusing on accessibility and optimization for SEO.

    • Utilized WordPress to manage, update, and debug client-facing and internal websites.

    • Ensured compliance with accessibility standards, increasing inclusivity for users.

  3. Mentorship and Leadership:

    • Led projects with teams of computer science interns, guiding them in website development and troubleshooting.

    • Collaborated on coding challenges, mentoring interns to foster skill development and teamwork.

    • Delivered training on tools like Asana, Elementor, and Figma, streamlining project management workflows.

  4. Content Management and Strategy:

    • Managed website content using WordPress CMS, ensuring accuracy and alignment with DigitalNest’s mission.

    • Integrated SEO strategies into content updates to increase search engine visibility and engagement.

    • Resolved technical issues efficiently to minimize downtime and maintain a seamless user experience.

  5. Innovative Solutions and Process Improvement:

    • Researched and implemented modern web technologies to keep the website innovative and relevant.

    • Built responsive and mobile-friendly layouts, enhancing accessibility across devices.

    • Developed solutions to streamline workflows, such as automation for repetitive tasks.

Core Responsibilities

  • Collaborated with cross-functional teams to maintain and enhance the DigitalNest website.

  • Utilized WordPress, Figma, and Elementor tools to develop and manage website features and content.

  • Led website projects, mentored interns, and collaborated on technical solutions to produce high-quality outcomes.

  • Ensured compliance with web accessibility standards and optimized website performance for SEO.

  • Facilitated task management using platforms like Asana, ensuring seamless coordination among team members.

  • Regularly monitored and resolved technical issues, maintaining the website’s reliability and functionality.

Impact and Skills

During my time at DigitalNest, I sharpened my skills in creating innovative solutions while working with a fantastic team. I was fortunate enough to guide interns, improve processes, and help ensure that our website not only met but exceeded standards for accessibility, SEO, and design. These experiences highlighted my passion for leadership, technical skills, and commitment to delivering meaningful web solutions that resonate with our organization's values.
